name: UnitConverterLinear
desc: A description of how to convert between units using a linear equation.

items.name: var coefficient: Double
items.desc: The coefficient to use in the linear unit conversion calculation.

items.name: var constant: Double
items.desc: The constant to use in the linear unit conversion calculation.

items.name: init(coefficient: Double)
items.desc: Initializes the unit converter with the coefficient you specify.

items.name: init(coefficient: Double, constant: Double)
items.desc: Creates a unit converter with the coefficient and constant you specify.
